item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_Service_Group
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_Service_Group Service Datatype Description Methods getGraphImage Get the connection or status graph image for a load balancer service group. getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_Service_Group record. getRoutingMethod getRoutingType getServiceReferences getServices getVirtualServer getVirtualServers kickAllConnections

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_Service_Group
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_Service_Group Datatype Description Local id Type: integer name Type: string notes Type: string routingMethodId Type: integer routingTypeId Type: integer timeout The timeout value for connections from remote clients to the load balancer. Timeout values are only valid for HTTP service groups. Type: integer Relational routingMethod Type: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_Routing_Method

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_Service_Group
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_Service_Group Service Datatype Description Local id Type: integer name Type: string notes Type: string routingMethodId Type: integer routingTypeId Type: integer timeout The timeout value for connections from remote clients to the load balancer. Timeout values are only valid for HTTP service groups. Type: integer Relational routingMethod Type: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_Routing_Method

item.title: getGraphImage
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller_LoadBalancer_Service_Group::getGraphImage Overview Get the graph image for a load balancer service group based on the supplied graph type and metric. The only available graph type currently is: ‘connections’, and the available metrics are: ‘day’, ‘week’ and ‘month’. This method returns the raw binary image data. Parameters Name Type Description graphType string The graph type can currently only be ‘connections’. metric string The metric can be ‘day’, ‘week’, or ‘month’.
